original_text: Since it was the day of Preparation, and so that the bodies would not remain on the cross on the Sabbath (for that Sabbath was a high day), the Jews asked Pilate that their legs might be broken and that they might be taken away.
korean_text: 이 날은 준비일이라 유대인들은 그 안식일이 큰 날이므로 그 안식일에 시체들을 십자가에 두지 아니하려 하여 빌라도에게 그들의 다리를 꺾어 시체를 치워 달라 하니

sentences.original_text: Since it was the day of Preparation
and so that the bodies would not remain on the cross
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 시체들이 십자가에 남아있지 않게 하기 위해

sentences.original_text: for that Sabbath was a high day
that their legs might be broken
and that they might be taken away
